original_title: The Best of Liandra Dahl and Friends, volume 2
overview: Welcome to the world of Liandra Dahl - kinky, funny, queer, genuine and fresh! The second volume opens with a couple who know exactly what the other wants, and uses an incredible variety of methods to assure their partner's total satisfaction. Then, we can only watch as Liandra plays the villain in an encounter with the lucky and voluptuous red-head, Chloe B, who withstands bondage, exquisite torture, and strictly pleasure. In the last scene, the Cabaret Desire stars, Liandra and Matisse, are reunited in a much more casual environment - just two gorgeous friends, hanging on the couch with some drinks, until naughtiness takes over.
title: The Best of Liandra Dahl and Friends, volume 2
